translation: Those whose wisdom has been taken away by this or that desire, go to other gods, following this or that rite, led by their own nature.
commentary: 7.20 by desires? Taih taih by this or that? Hritajnanaá¸¥ those whose wisdom has been rented away? approach? Other gods other gods? Tam tam this or that? The rule rite? Faith having followed? Prakritiya by nature? Fixed led? Swaya by ones own.Commentary Those who desire wealth? children? the (small) Siddhis? etc.? are deprived of discrimination. They devote themselves to other minor gods
